original_text: his offering was one silver plate whose weight was 130 shekels, one silver basin of 70 shekels, according to the shekel of the sanctuary, both of them full of fine flour mixed with oil for a grain offering;
korean_text: 그의 헌물도 성소의 세겔로 백삼십 세겔 무게의 은반 하나와 칠십 세겔 무게의 은 바리 하나라 이 두 그릇에는 소제물로 기름 섞은 고운 가루를 채웠고

sentences.original_text: his offering was one silver plate
according to the shekel of the sanctuary
both of them full of fine flour mixed with oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그 두 그릇에는 기름을 섞은 고운 가루가 가득 담겨
